feature.name: Standard Deviation
feature.description: Measures the dispersion of the distribution from the average

feature.name: Mean
feature.description: Locates the central location of the distribution

feature.name: Skewness
feature.description: Measures the asymmetry of the distribution

feature.name: Kurtosis
feature.description: Measures the peakedness of the distribution

feature.name: Contrast
feature.description: Measures the amount of gray-level co-occurence differences

feature.name: Correlation
feature.description: Measures the dependence among gray-level co-occurence data.

feature.name: Energy
feature.description: Measures the order of the gray-level co-occurence data

feature.name: Entropy
feature.description: Measures the disorder of the gray-level co-occurence data

feature.name: Homogeneity
feature.description: Measures the sameness of gray-level co-occurrence values
